item.title: The fourth bootcamp for 1Malaysia Entrepreneurs has begun
item.description: Source: 1MET. Over 500 participants attended the 1MET bootcamps in Kota Kinabalu. The 1Malaysia Entrepreneur (1MET) program, an initiative of the National Entrepreneurship Development Office (NEDO) within the Malaysian Ministry of Finance, has initiated its fourth round of two-day entrepreneurial bootcamps. Utilizing an experiential model, these bootcamps offer a six-month mentoring and coaching opportunity for 500 chosen business concepts. The first group to benefit from this follow-up program commenced in August 2016.
